content: free video tutorial only knitting pattern for sizes 0-3 3-6 6-12 12-24 months https //www etsy com/listing/1190266336/knitting-pattern-the-mere-baby-pullover the mere baby pullover is a sweater for babies and toddlers this is a classic raglan worked in the round on circular needles top-down with raglan increases this pattern is so customizable depending on your preferences for length this pullover should be worn with 5-6 5 inches/12-16 5 cm in positive ease at the chest pullover sizes 0-3 months 3-6 months 6-12 months 12-24 months the sizes 0-3 months 3-6 months 6-12 months 12-24 months correspond to a chest measurement of approximately 14 5-16 16-17 5 17 5-19 19-20 5 inches/36-40 40-44 44-48 48-52 cm finished approx measurements after blocking chest circumference 0-3 months - 20 5 inches/52 cm 3-6 months - 22 5 inches/57 5 cm 6-12 months - 25 inches/63 cm 12-24 months - 27 inches/68 5 cm note shown in size 0-3 months on the youtube channel seventhsedge gauge swatch blocked 15 stitches x 30 row in garter stitch on the u s 8 5 mm needles = 4x4 inches/10x10 cm suggested needles u s 8 5mm circular needles and u s 8 5 mm double-pointed needles if the sleeves are will be not worked using the magic loop technique or the necessary needle size to obtain gauge suggested yarn aran 8 wpi weight yarn wool 65 % alpaca 35 % 50g 1 76oz = 82 yds 75 m 150 200 250 300 g drops nepal used materials needed scissors stitch markers tapestry needle measurement tape
